Description: Create a surge of plasma, boiling water, and fire that electrocutes and burns everything in its wake.
Release a cloud of electrified steam and fire that shocks, burns, and pushes back all enemies.
Summon a thunderstorm filled with boiling rain and fire, striking lightning at random targets.
Emit a burst of lightning, steam, and fire that incinerates and electrocutes all nearby foes.
Unleash the combined fury of fire, water, air, earth, and lightning, creating an elemental storm that obliterates everything.
